name: Dr. Mohammad Hany Yassin
title: Associate Professor of Civil & Structural Engineering
bio: Civil/structural engineer with 20 years in academia and industry. Research interests: SHM (FBGs, AI), sustainable materials (PTF/NFRC), and seismic/bridge engineering.
glance: Research: SHM with FBGs and AI Applications in Civil Engineering
Teaching: Steel Strucutres, Concrete Structures, Analysis of Structures, Solid Mechancis
Consultation: Bridge Engineering, SSI, and Seismic Design
